trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_SEQ_00<tab>Yubli is waiting on a shipment to arrive.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Moblin porter.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_TODO_01<tab>Pick up the crate of goldwork.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_TODO_02<tab>Carry the crate of goldwork to the supply officer.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Yubli.

TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_YUBLI_000_001<tab>An important shipment has just arrived from Earthenshire, delivered to the nearest wharf by punutiy. The problem, however, is that the crate is <var 1A 02 /var>extremely<var 1A 01 /var> heavy.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_YUBLI_000_002<tab>I'd like to have it moved before arriving customers trip over it, but our Moblin porter appears to be struggling with the weight.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_YUBLI_000_003<tab>Could you go down to the wharf and lend a hand? The porter will tell you where the crate needs to be.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_MOBLIN05222_000_010<tab>Special Advisor! Thank you for coming to handhelp floppyarm Mobbie!

TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_MOBLIN05222_000_011<tab>Potsworn goldwork is a popular choice for Kozama'uka memorykeeping! But a crate holding many goldcrafts is too much bulkyweight for one Moblin to move. Please, he needs an ironarm adventurer to carry it to the supply officer!
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>Deliver the crate of goldwork to the supply officer waiting outside the travel agency storehouse before the time runs out.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>You will have sixty seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_MOBLIN05222_000_020<tab>That crate is too heavy for Mobbie, but the supply officer will be waiting! Please make the delivery with careful eyewatchings and quicksteps!
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_MOBLIN05222_000_021<tab>What's wrong? Was the crate too much bulkyweight even for you? Maybe you just need a shortrest before trying again!
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_MOBLIN05222_000_022<tab>Something else tickling your braincage? Mobbie is happy to leave the potsworn goldcraft in your capable helphands!
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_WORKER05222_000_025<tab>The goods we ordered should have been delivered by now...
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>Collect the Moblin porter's crate of goldwork from the wharf and deliver it to the supply officer.

TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_WORKER05222_000_030<tab>Ah, is that the shipment from Earthenshire? Thank you for bringing it in. I would have picked it up myself, but sorting out our inventory has kept me chained to the storehouse.

TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_WORKER05222_000_031<tab>Potsworn craft is in high demand, and maintaining a steady supply has been a logistical headache, to say the least. We've just had a customer asking about availability, so I'd like to get this goldwork on the shelves sooner rather than later.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_YUBLI_000_040<tab>Thank you for taking care of that delivery so quickly!

TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_YUBLI_000_041<tab>The potsworn's goldwork we sell in our shop is highly sought after by customers with more...expensive taste. It seems a memento like this becomes all the more special for having found it in such memorable surrounds.
TEXT_BANPEL124_05222_YUBLI_000_042<tab>Which is all to say that if we're not careful, our stock soon runs dangerously low. I'd be grateful if you could help out again should we need a hand!
